snippet.title: Wuthering Waves — Closed Beta II Gameplay Trailer | Awakening: A World Reborn
snippet.description:
Wuthering Waves CBT2 Recruitment is now open! 
Rise and set forth on your new journey, Rover.

Join CBT2 recruitment at: https://wutheringwaves.kurogame.com/en/cbt

Wuthering Waves is a cross-platform, open-world action RPG set to launch globally, featuring combat gameplay with high degrees of freedom and profound narrative content.

Official Website:
http://wutheringwaves.kurogame.com/en
Official X/Twitter:
https://twitter.com/Wuthering_Waves
Official Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/WutheringWaves.Official
Official Reddit:
https://www.reddit.com/r/WutheringWaves
Official Discord:
https://discord.com/invite/wutheringwaves
Official TikTok:
https://www.tiktok.com/@wutheringwaves_official
Official Instagram:
https://www.instagram.com/wuthering_waves
